replace.description: A file or folder with the name "{{name}}" already exists in the destination folder. Do you want to replace it?

delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete the "{{name}}" {{something}}?

trash.description: Are you sure you want to move the "{{name}}" to the trash?

edit_filename_cancel.description: Do you want to save the rename content?

close.title: Do you want to save the changes?

automatic_updates.label: Automatic update
automatic_updates.desc: Automatically check for updates and install them when the application starts.

switch_auto_save.label: Autosave
switch_auto_save.desc: Switch automatic saving. The current file will be automatically saved according to the set time interval.

autosaveInterval.label: Auto save interval
autosaveInterval.desc: Set the interval of auto save, in milliseconds.

language.label: Language
language.desc: Set the language of the app.

full_width.label: Full width
full_width.desc: Set the editor to full width.

font_size.label: Font size
font_size.desc: Set the root font size of the editor.

line_height.label: Line height
line_height.desc: Set the root line height of the editor.

font_family.label: Font family
font_family.desc: Set the root font family of the editor.

code_font_family.label: Code font family
code_font_family.desc: Set the code font family of the editor.

md_default_mode.label: Markdown Default Mode
md_default_mode.desc: Sets the default editing mode when creating a new Markdown file.

codemirror_linewrap.label: Code block wrap
codemirror_linewrap.desc: Whether the line breaks when the number of line words in the code block exceeds.

models.label: Models
models.desc: A model list separated by commas, default is "gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4-32k, gpt-4"

models.desc: A model list separated by commas, default is ""

models.desc: A model list separated by commas, default is ""

api_base.label: API Base
api_base.desc: The API address AI by Google.

models.label: Model List
models.desc: Model list, separated by commas. The default value is ""

resetAppConf.label: Reset Application Configuration
resetAppConf.desc: Reset the application configuration to restore the default settings. This will reset all settings, including theme, language, autosave, etc., and cannot be restored.
resetAppConf.success: The app configuration has been reset to default values.

when_paste_image.label: When pasted text contains a picture
when_paste_image.desc: Select the default behavior when pasting pictures in the editor.

options.save_to_file_relative: Save to a path relative to the current file

paste_image_save_absolute_path.label: Global Absolute Path
paste_image_save_absolute_path.desc: When you paste a picture, the picture is saved to this path.

paste_image_save_relative_path.label: Workspace relative path
paste_image_save_relative_path.desc: When "Paste Picture", the picture will be calculated relative to the current workspace path according to your rules and saved to this path

paste_image_save_relative_path_rule.label: Path Rules
paste_image_save_relative_path_rule.desc: ${documentPath} refers to the parent folder path of the file you are currently editing. When you paste the picture, the picture will be saved to the path relative to the current file.

when_upload_image.label: Upload Image Behavior
when_upload_image.desc: Select the behavior when uploading image files in the editor (upload behavior includes: drag and drop image files, but also screenshot software paste)

options.save_to_file_relative: Save to a path relative to the current file

upload_image_save_absolute_path.label: Global Absolute Path
upload_image_save_absolute_path.desc: When you upload an image, the image is saved to this path.

upload_image_save_relative_path.label: Workspace relative path
upload_image_save_relative_path.desc: When "uploading an image", the image will be calculated relative to the current workspace path according to your rules and saved to this path

upload_image_save_relative_path_rule.label: Path Rules
upload_image_save_relative_path_rule.desc: ${documentPath} refers to the parent folder path of the file you are currently editing. When uploading an image, the image will be saved to the path relative to the current file.

zoom.label: Scaling
zoom.desc: Scales or enlarges the display scale of the entire page

headers_config.label: Configure Request Header
headers_config.desc: Add custom HTTP request headers to support multiple key-value pairs.
